title: [Gameplay] Karthus VO not working
body: When playing an ARAM, there were no karthus VO's heard at all, not during movement, ability cast or joking/taunting. All other champs were heard.

replies.body: Should be resolved with this patch (6.3). Lemme know if you're still having issues!
thank you, i didnt have the chance to read patch notes before posting this. sorry for the spam >_<

sometimes, i dont have the time to read patch notes, much less your stories. 
its not that i dont pay attention, and was trying to do the right bug reporting.
I can understand, but trust me you were not the only one who didn't read it.
